transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir Jagdish ji baat kare Deepak Marble Handicraft se?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Jagdish ji very good afternoon Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapka na call aaya tha IndiaMART ke customer care number pe thoda jaanna chah raha tha sir kya problem face kar rahe the kuch concern mein puch raha tha ki hai na wo ek vyapar app se kya wo ek pata nahi kya download karwa rahe hain wo vyapar wo billing ka pata nahi kya aapne 2000 ka wo free mila hai billing app ji ji to kya hota hai uske bare mein detail jaanna chahta hu main bata deta hu sir actually vyapar app kya hai na ek accounting software hai.
Customer: Achcha ji.
Executive: To iska abhi hum ek saal ka che mahine ka subscription kareeb aapko free dete hain isme hum.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai sir isme kya hota hai ki aap jaise usme pura detail save kar sakte hain buyer ka uske liye invoice create kar sakte hain aur jaise aapne suna hai na sir companies ke invoice automatically wo generate ho jate company name and all to ek software ke through hota hai wo so vyapar ek software hai jo aapko billing ke liye jaise usme aapne kisi buyer ka naam fix kar diya ram ram ne aapko bola ki wo aapko ek mahine baad payment karega to aap usme save kar sakte hain ki is date ko wo payment karega to aapko notification aa jayega ki aapko inse payment lena hai aaj ke din samajh rahe hain sir to ha ye ha ye pura na accounting se related ka aapka rehta hai matlab invoicing ho gaya save karke rakhna ledger kind of aap uska maintain kar sakte hain ki kis se kitna amount aapko lena hai kitna aapko matlab pending hai to ye sari cheeze usme matlab aapko kya hoga jo jab aap ye software hum active wo aapko download karenge to wo aapko pura batayenge vyapar team wale.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ki inke kya kya feature hai uses hai wo detail mein aapko bataya jayega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To wahi usse related to aapne abhi download kar liya sir vyapar app?
Customer: Nahi nahi karenge abhi to.
Executive: To kariye sir try kariye free hai matlab agar aapko lagta hai ki matlab aage jaake ye aapko help kar raha hai kyuki dekhiye aap ek ek kisi person se to deal kar nahi rahe honge aapke multiple buyers honge right sir to kisko kisne kab payment kiya wo sari cheeze aap mobile ke through operate kar sakte hain save kar sakte hain desktop ke through agar aap computer use kar sakte ho kisi person ko bithaye wo usme sari data entry kare matlab entry ke naam dalna aur wo sab kuch calculate karke apna invoice agar create karna hai aapko company ka apni jaise koi aapse bolta hai mujhe GST invoice dijiye to aapko kuch detail fill karni hai wo invoice aapko create karke de dega uske andar.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: To ye sare feature sir aapko isme matlab available milenge free hai aap main aapko recommend karunga aap utilize kariye ji GST wagera GST kya rate chal rahi hai wo sara kar dega kya wo apne aap hi apne ko dalni padegi GST rate wagera.
Executive: Sir wo sab to dalna padega jaise kya hota hai na industry to industry GST vary karta hai to aapko aapko kya karna hai usme sirf detail fill karna hai jaise aapne naam dal diya mobile number dal diya kya product hai uska price dal diya uske baad wo PDF format mein apne aap create karke de dega jo jo information aap aise daloge ek ek karke wo sara ek professional way mein jaise aaj kal companies aap aap bhi kharite hain to proper invoicing hota hai upar pehle product ka naam fir total uske baad GST kitna fir pura final total to aise dikhata hai na sir to wo sari cheeze sir isme matlab aap kar sakte hain pura acche se bas iska yahi ha yahi iska feature hai baki aapko hamari team se aa gaya sir matlab download karwaya gaya vyapar app aapko team ka call aaya aapke pass?
Customer: Ha team ka call aaya lekin hamare kam ka nahi hai sir.
Executive: Agar aapko nahi lagta kam ka ha waise ye free hai matlab aisa nahi hai ki aapko free hai abki baat lekin wo jaise main samajh pa raha hu wo hamara cheez alag hai ye cheeze alag hai isme nahi baithega hamara main ye puch raha tha ki aapne jaise ki bola tha jab maine ye liya tha IndiaMART to bola tha roz ka ek grahak aapko milega to wo to koi wo ho nahi raha mere pass to koi aa hi nahi raha koi ek do teen call aayi thi bas uske baad me kuch nahi hai.
Executive: To sir aap actively services use kariye thoda main dekh raha hu thoda din mein ek do bar open karte hain aap video call pe aa sakte hain main jo aapke account manager hai Muskan Gupta unko main video call ke through wo aapko ek ek cheez batayengi kaise filter karna hai dekhiye sir kya hota hai hum aapko lead la ke dete hain ki aapke product ka lead convert karna sir kahin na kahin aapke hath mein hota hai hum aap tak lead pahunchate hain to lead kaise filter karni hai wo sara agar aap bolenge main dobara Muskan Gupta se bolta hu aap se baat kare video aap system ke samne kab available honge sir computer system pe nahi matlab mobile chalo main karti hu main abhi thodi der mein hota hu aadhe ek aadhe ghante ke andar mujhe call kijiyega isi number pe sir theek hai baki ye concern mein aapka jo vyapar se related tha isko close kar raha hu baki aap ek bar kariyega install main aapko yahi recommend karunga theek hai sir theek hai free hai use karke dekhiye usme aapko koi charges nahi katega shayad aapko koi cheez achi kam ki dikh jaye warna fir jaise sir aapko lage theek hai sir aur mujhe call kijiyega main aapko pura detail mein ek bar pura hum go through karte hain ki last ek mahine se kaise kaise use kare aur kya achcha kar sakte hain isme taki business generate ho theek hai sir ek feedback mail aayega sir Pravesh Sharma likh ke usme feedback satisfy jarur dijiyega agar aap satisfy ho bilkul theek hai thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about Vyapar app details.

- Not receiving daily customer leads as promised.



Resolution:

- Explained Vyapar app is an accounting software.

- Suggested to install and try Vyapar app.

- Executive offered a video call with account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- vyapar app, buyleads, subscription, gst, invoicing
